snippet: The league’s trade window opens shortly after the gold medal game in Sochi, and players whose contracts are about to expire are most vulnerable.
abstract: Slap Shot column; best hockey players in the world are competing in the Olympics, but some of them face the prospect of being traded by their NHL teams when the season resumes; NHL's trade window opens shortly after gold medal game in Sochi, and players whose contracts are about to expire are most vulnerable; other hockey news noted.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

lead_paragraph: The league’s trade window opens shortly after the gold medal game in Sochi, and players whose contracts are about to expire are most vulnerable.

headline.main: Olympians May Go From Sochi to N.H.L. Trading Block
headline.print_headline: From Sochi, Perhaps to Trading Block
